[vc_row][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1578644260816{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1578659344852{background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column_inner]

Franking

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1578659385675{margin-top: -20px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Franking is the process to stamp property documents. Using franking, authorised banks stamp your document or affix a denomination on it, which acts as a proof that the stamp duty for the transaction has been paid.

Reduce the stress of visiting several offices & standing in long queues when you pay stamp duty through franking services available at GSC Bank Head Office Naranpura Branch

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1578659390674{margin-top: -20px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”4049″ img_size=”large” style=”vc_box_shadow_border”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
